ABC Started its overseas operation in 2009 which covers business areas like import, Trading Real estate. ABC project WLL Doha Is located at Souq Al Qalah, Near safari hyper market, Doha, Qatar. 25 efficient and well experienced personnel are actively engaged here. ABC group is one of the leading ceramic tiles and sanitory supplier in Qatar since 2009. At present ABC is mainly importing from India, China and Italy and across middle east. ABC has got a total volume of turn over of 500 more container per year and is the leading wholesale dealer in Doha Qatar since 2009 with more than 100 dealers allover Qatar. As part of globalization of ABC brand, ABC group has extended its business to African Countries, we have started our first operation at Uganda. We have established an exclusive showroom for Bathwares and Tiles at Kampala in the name of ABC STILES and BATHZ in 2016. This is the one of the best showroom in Uganda, for the time being ABC group is planning to start more operations in African Countries.
